name: LD 47: Endless Night
description: Endless Night is a Compo entry for Ludum Dare 47: Stuck in a Loop. While struggling to get attached to the theme, I started working on random art assets. Those assets pointed me in a direction of a "graveyard" theme. Rogue-like randomness and the sudden urge to make a third person game brought Endless Night to life. I hope you have some fun blasting zombies, skeletons, and ghosts in the face with your magic. Get in there and empower that graveyard!
